column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=webanno.custom.RoleAnnotation|roles
#Text=Mr.
#Text=Nebenzia (Russian Federation) (spoke in Russian): I would like to thank the German presidency\r
#Text=for organizing today's meeting and to express our\r
#Text=profound gratitude to the participants and briefers for\r
#Text=their information about various aspects of the fight\r
#Text=against sexual violence and armed conflict.
#Text=This year marks a decade since the Security\r
#Text=Council established the post of Special Representative\r
#Text=of the Secretary-General on Sexual Violence in\r
#Text=Conflict.
#Text=Since then the Special Representative and her\r
#Text=Office have done extensive work on eliminating this\r
#Text=form of crime.
#Text=They have gained useful experience in\r
#Text=cooperating with Governments and other parties to\r
#Text=armed conflicts and developing an effective toolkit for\r
#Text=combating this type of crime.
#Text=The Russian Federation is committed to international\r
#Text=cooperation in combating sexual violence in conflict,\r
#Text=which is a disgusting crime of war.
#Text=We firmly support\r
#Text=the work of Special Representative Patten and appreciate\r
#Text=her personal contribution to efforts to develop and\r
#Text=support dialogue with parties to armed conflicts in\r
#Text=addressing this issue, help victims and assist in their\r
#Text=rehabilitation, as well as to draw public attention to\r
#Text=the problems caused by such crimes.
#Text=We thank the\r
#Text=Secretary-General for his briefing and his report on\r
#Text=conflict-related sexual violence (S/2019/280), which\r
#Text=is enabling us to discuss the issue in a productive and\r
#Text=comprehensive debate.
#Text=We have studied with interest\r
#Text=the report's very extensive recommendations on ways\r
#Text=to cooperate further in combating sexual violence in\r
#Text=conflict.
#Text=Many of the proposals deserve careful and\r
#Text=detailed study, and we believe that today's debate is a\r
#Text=good opportunity for an open exchange of views on that.
#Text=We firmly believe that the key to success in\r
#Text=combating sexual violence in conflict is in developing\r
#Text=effective measures to eradicate violence against\r
#Text=civilians during armed conflicts.
#Text=But that is just one of\r
#Text=the possible crimes that could be committed during an\r
#Text=armed conflict.
#Text=In our view, putting a definitive end to\r
#Text=every form of violence against civilians is possible only\r
#Text=by resolving armed conflicts through peaceful means\r
#Text=and eradicating their root causes.
#Text=We need concerted\r
#Text=work at both the national and international levels if we\r
#Text=are to reach that goal as quickly as possible.
#Text=In that regard, we want to emphasize once\r
#Text=again how important it is to ensure that the Special\r
#Text=Representative of the Secretary-General on Sexual\r
#Text=Violence in Conflict continues to adhere to the mandate\r
#Text=established by resolution 1888 (2009).
#Text=The central focus\r
#Text=of her efforts should be situations of armed conflict,\r
#Text=and specifically those where sexual Violence is\r
#Text=widespread.
#Text=Every conflict situation has specifics that\r
#Text=must be taken into account.
#Text=It is also important not to\r
#Text=underestimate the significance of maintaining a united\r
#Text=approach to understanding the scope of the Security\r
#Text=Council's mandate on combating sexual violence in\r
#Text=conflict and of refraining from attempts to broaden its\r
#Text=interpretation and take the Council beyond its remit of\r
#Text=maintaining international peace and security.
#Text=A strict\r
#Text=distinction should be made between sexual violence as\r
#Text=a war crime and as an ordinary criminal offence.
#Text=We should remember that the effectiveness of the\r
#Text=Council's work in eliminating sexual violence in conflict\r
#Text=is directly dependent on overcoming differences,\r
#Text=promoting constructive cooperation and preventing the\r
#Text=issue from being politicized.
#Text=We call on everyone to\r
#Text=unite their efforts to combat this repugnant crime in the\r
#Text=interests of maintaining peace and assisting victims,\r
#Text=and for the sake ofbuilding ajust society where there is\r
#Text=no place for any kind of violence at all.
